creator: joseph.chintu@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34951
sample jmx file

Hi Colleagues,

We are using JMeter tool for automation of our Odata services.
Team is facing an issue since from few months and off late very frequently.

Whenever one try to load/run a JMeter file , the file is getting corrupted. 
JMX File for our OData service gets corrupted when just clicked on SAVE after some changes are done..

This is a big concern as we will lose the JMX File , if not backed up every second changes are made and can’t even rely on the backup as it might also be corrupted while saving.

I tried raising a ticket from the Bugzilla site, but in vain.
Please help and treat this at very high priority.


Thanks & Best Regards,
Chintu

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
There is no known bug.
Please provide more elements:
- if you installed 3rd party plugins
- how to reproduce
- the jmeter.log when saving and when reloading

Thanks

Check that you didn't get an OutOfMemoryError which leads to error saving file.
Such questions should be asked on User mailing list.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
